articles.title: Dopamine isn't just a "feel good" chemical: New study reveals its role in reversal learning - PsyPost
articles.description: Researchers discovered dopamine plays a crucial role in adapting decisions to changing situations. Using PET and fMRI scans, they found dopamine increases in the brain's reward center during task changes, aiding learning from mistakes.
